name: RocketFire
description:
A  game made for Major Jam 3: Retro

RocketFire is a Galaga like game with purposefully grid like movement like Tetris.
The Goal of the game is to get allot of points by defeating as much enemies as you can.

Game Engine : Godot
Graphics : Aesprite
Sfx : rFXgen

Note:

The game was originally designed for level based gameplay but due to technical issues it became a infinite shooter instead.
